name: StudentFinance-Students-GET-getStudents
description: [Student Finance] GET /students — Retrieves a collection of students.

schema.name: academicLevel
schema.description: query parameter: academicLevel

schema.name: academicUnit
schema.description: Derived Academic Units.

schema.name: activeOnly
schema.description: Only return active students.

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

schema.name: programOfStudy
schema.description: For students who haven't matriculated, the program of study they either applied to or have been admitted to. For matriculated students, the primary program of study from their reporting record.

schema.name: search
schema.description: A fuzzy search string that matches student IDs and names. Example: search=bri%20book returns the student Brian Booker.

name: StudentFinance-Students-GET-getStudents_1
description: [Student Finance] GET /students/{ID} — Retrieves a student instance.

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

name: StudentFinance-Students-GET-getPayments
description: [Student Finance] GET /students/{ID}/payments/{subresourceID} — Retrieves a single student payment instance for the specified student ID.

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

schema.name: subresourceID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the subresource.

name: StudentFinance-Students-PATCH-patchPayments
description: [Student Finance] PATCH /students/{ID}/payments/{subresourceID} — Partially updates an existing student payment for the student instance.

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

schema.name: subresourceID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the subresource.

schema.name: requestBody
schema.description: JSON request body.

name: StudentFinance-Students-GET-getPayments_1
description: [Student Finance] GET /students/{ID}/payments — Retrieves a collection of student payments.

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

schema.name: academicPeriod
schema.description: The academic period associated with this object. When the object is associated with both a starting and an ending academic period, such as a financial aid period record, this report field returns the starting academic period.

schema.name: fromDate
schema.description: Limit student payments to payments made on or after this date, using the yyyy-mm-dd format.

schema.name: institutionalAcademicUnit
schema.description: The academic unit, an organizational type for academic appointments.

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

schema.name: paymentItem
schema.description: The student payment item that is associated with the student payment.

schema.name: paymentReference
schema.description: The check number or EFT number associated with a student payment.

schema.name: paymentType
schema.description: The payment type for the reporting transaction.

schema.name: toDate
schema.description: Limit student payments to payments made on or before this date, using the yyyy-mm-dd format.

name: StudentFinance-Students-POST-postPayments
description: [Student Finance] POST /students/{ID}/payments — Creates a student payment.

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

schema.name: requestBody
schema.description: JSON request body.
